page.title: 16HOUSING/ROADS
page.content: The four main types of housing in our area are :cob 4% (clay mixed with gravel and straw),2% still have thatched roofs(cottages etc.), 45% are made of stone and 49% are modern houses made of concrete blocks.Half the housing in the area is used for permanent homes.A quarter of houses are holiday lets.Another quarter are used as holiday homes by the owners. Only a quarter of the residents are local. Out of the whole area 70% of residents are retired.{ROADS: The inland roads are high hedged and fairly narrow.The road surface is tarmac and chippings.There are single yellow lines on either side.The hedges are made of mud and slate and are thick with vegetation.The roads are fairly quiet.They are very twisty and make their way up and down the hills. There are footpaths or pavements.
